message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $120 for it.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for your product. However, $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable spending. Would you be willing to consider $105? I believe this would be a fair price for both of us.
Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $110 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  However, $110 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm prepared to offer $108.  This price is within my budget and allows for a fair profit for you.
Considering the value and benefits of our product, I believe we can reach an agreement that suits both of us. I propose a price of $112 for the product.

Alice, I'm starting to think we're not going to be able to agree on a price.  While I appreciate you being willing to negotiate,  $112 is still above my budget.  I'm going to have to stick with my previous offer of $108. If you aren't willing to accept that, I may have to explore other options.
